text: The Last Hero is a fantasy novel by Terry Pratchett. The Last Hero may also refer to: * The Last Hero (The Saint), a 1930 adventure novel by Leslie Charteris * The Last Hero (album), a 2016 album by Alter Bridge * Last Hero, a Russian reality TV series * Posledniy geroy (The Last Hero in English), a 1989 album by Soviet band Kino ==See also== * Last Hero in China, a martial arts film * The Lost Hero, a fantasy-adventure novel by Rick Riordan
title: The Last Hero (disambiguation)
